alert.note: Alert for East Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 8:57PM CST until January 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected in higher elevations. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Cherokee and Clay Counties. In Tennessee, East Polk County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
